title: Formal garden

properties.value: A formal garden is a room in Player-owned house, that can be built at level 55 Construction for 75,000, and has different decorations to the lower level garden. In addition, it does not have the tall grass that the lower level garden does.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Formal garden
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Not to be confused with Superior garden.
Formal garden
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level55
Cost75,000
Door layout
Formal garden

A formal garden is a room in Player-owned house, that can be built at level 55 Construction for 75,000, and has different decorations to the lower level garden. In addition, it does not have the tall grass that the lower level garden does.

For planting, the player needs to be holding a watering can (with water) in the player's inventory.

There are 8 hotspots available:

  • Big plant
  • Big plant 2
  • Centrepiece space
  • Fencing
  • Hedging
  • Small plant
  • Small plant 2
  • Tip jar space

Contents

  • 1 Big plant / Small plant
  • 2 Big plant 2 / Small plant 2
  • 3 Centrepiece
  • 4 Fencing
  • 5 Hedging
  • 6 Tip jar

Big plant / Small plant[edit | edit source]

Note: As with all plantable items in Construction, the player will receive the same amount of experience for Construction and Farming.

Level Plant Materials[1] Experience Cost
1 Pumpkin Magical pumpkin 1 0
66 Sunflower Bagged sunflower 70
70 		5,717
71 Marigolds Bagged marigolds 100
100 		10,901
76 Roses Bagged roses 122
122 		16,481
  1. ↑ A watering can with at least 1 dose is required.
